text: Hello! How to create batch line item by API? How to set up properties array in Inpit collection?
Hi! Can someone please help me out with adding meta tags in a hubSpot  website page? I need to add meta tags. Which is the best place to add those tags?
Those should be managed by your templates.

Hey Hubbies,

Im Estelle from France, based in Berlin. I am a FE engineer, just finished the first HubSpot tutorial.
my company decided to use it for our website :slightly_smiling_face: looking forward to learning and implementing cool themes and modules !

I am trying to use a Test portal to assign a system domain differently than the webpages, the test portals show two types of system domains, is there way to change two blogs in a portal to those two different system domains in a test portal?
Can you please share a SS of the location. I am wondering what will happen if I use the same template for building two different pages after putting those tags at template level.

<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cos-general/how-can-i-add-code-snippets-to-the-head-and-footer-html-of-my-pages>

Here you can find add code at page level or globally
